remarks: Deduction from extensionality principle for relations.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
eqbrrdv.1 $e |- ( ph -> Rel A ) $.
eqbrrdv.2 $e |- ( ph -> Rel B ) $.
eqbrrdv.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( x A y <-> x B y ) ) $.
eqbrrdv $p |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d ph x y $.
